title: Living tomorrow. No. 094
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Reproduction of color photographs in newspapers with last scanning; police mobile transmission facsimile helps distraught mothers find their children lost in the street; what a maxi-hovercraft can do; techniques for coloring glass: combining colors without weakening the material itself.
